data.eml:eml: The ancient Balkan lakes harbor a new endemic species of Diaphanosoma Fischer, 1850 (Crustacea: Branchiopoda: Cladocera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Korovchinsky, Nikolai M., Petkovski, Trajan K. (2014): The ancient Balkan lakes harbor a new endemic species of Diaphanosoma Fischer, 1850 (Crustacea: Branchiopoda: Cladocera). Zootaxa 3784 (5): 539-549, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.5.3
